title: I can't find my astro poro ward skin
body: I got a astro poro ward skin from hextech and I permanently unlocked it, but when I get in champ select I can't find it anywhere. Is this a bug? Can someone please help me with this.

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this?  There was a visual issue where some unlocked ward skins were not selectable.  Let me know if everything is okay now!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GHgcFExE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-16T18:21:57.190+0000)
>
> Are you still experiencing this?  There was a visual issue where some unlocked ward skins were not selectable.  Let me know if everything is ok 
I can see it now. I unlocked it last week but up until now it wasn't showing.
